title: How to make Pixel 2 bring scan QR Code in Network & Internet?
content:
Hi,

I'm crazy now.

Last night, when I access the Network and Internet on my Pixel 2, tap on the "+", there is an proccess to add eSIM, anh there is an QR Code scanner, but my old eSIM (on printed paper) was terminate.

So this morning, I went to buy another eSIM. But when I'm home, I cannot bring the QR Code scanner (like last evening). I don't know why?

Any help? Thanks you.
